channel.title: Weird glitches
channel.description:
My server is the 562/659 Project Dung. Server base. SPOON FEEDING WOULD BE NICE, I BEEN TRYING TO FIGURE THESE OUT FOR AWHILE:
I have a couple glitches: 1st: Sometimes when i attack people with a weapon it will look like your praying and you go down on your knees.
2nd: Range does not hit high. I'm trying to raise the range accuracy so it actually hits but its not working. Any ideas on how to change what range hits, please let me know
3rd: Dragon claws hit max hp at the last special. (fourth special)
